Name: Guns N' Boxes
About the game: Guns N' Boxes is no longer in development. As each of us move forward to new challenges we would like to thank all our players, new and old, by making the game free to play. Please enjoy a look at our first big project. An unfinished, messy game which captured our hearts and imagination as we stumbled to give it form. From everyone at LightArrow Games: Franco, Mauricio, Nicolas and Gast√≥n Thank you for playing Guns N' Boxes
